preqs: CIV2242 and completion of 132 credit points

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed a unit in {CIV2242} and  Must have passed 132 credit points)

description: Students are introduced to the state-of-the-art in numerical methods and their application for engineering design. The unit provides an overview of existing numerical methods and theory and provides a background for the selection of the most appropriate numerical modelling procedure for specific applications.
